comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Wildcard block should not be placed on Cloudflare R2 domain
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pub-*.r2.dev

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
It's related to this bug - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/tsurlfilter/issues/130 and cuased by this rule:
```adblock

Появляется видео реклама после которой вылазит окно, которое приложил к обращению. Пытался сделать скриншот во время проигрыша рекламы. Но при любой попытке что-либо нажать, сделать свайп - телефон переходит по ссылке на Гугл-плей рекламированной игры. Так что сделал только скриншот окна после рекламы. Готов предоставить дополнительную информацию, если необходима Username: `@RomchikL` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
К сожалению, реклама снова появляется. Уточню, что после выигрыша у меня еще ни разу не вылезла, после проигрыша - через раз. Скорее вылазит спустя некоторое время простоя. Не играл сутки-двое, играешь, проиграл - вылезла, но если еще раз проиграть - не замечал.
Реклама всегда одинаковая - это видео, видимо, их другой игры - нарды. Идет видеоролик. При попытке куда-либо нажать/свайпнуть - сразу переход в гугл плей на эту игру ([ссылка](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ahoygames.backgammon)).

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.3.53

Website or app doesn't work properly

Chrome

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter

AdGuard Japanese filter

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Появляется видео реклама после которой вылазит окно, которое приложил к обращению. Пытался сделать скриншот во время проигрыша рекламы. Но при любой попытке что-либо нажать, сделать свайп - телефон переходит по ссылке на Гугл-плей рекламированной игры. Так что сделал только скриншот окна после рекламы. Готов предоставить дополнительную информацию, если необходима Username: `@RomchikL` ### Screenshots

issue.title: Wildcard block should not be placed on Cloudflare R2 domain

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pub-*.r2.dev

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hi folks — I work at Cloudflare and want to add some context here.

Blocking `https://pub-*.r2.dev` is equivalent to blocking `*.s3.amazonaws.com`, `*.storage.googleapis.com` or `storage.googleapis.com/*` — this is a shared domain with per-customer subdomains, identical to how AWS and Google Cloud provide public bucket URLs for their object storage.

As it stands, the rule blocks any site attempting to serve any content from their storage bucket — JS, CSS, HTML, images, video files, file downloads — directly.

You are welcome to block _specific_ buckets — e.g. `pub-12345abcdef.r2.dev` that don't match your content rules, but blocking the entire subdomain (`pub-*`) blocks every single public bucket past and future.

issue.body:

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.3.53

Website or app doesn't work properly

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> What exactly is broken by this rule, used in ad blockers? Need a real case. 

Everytime I create a bucket in my Cloudflare account and try to visit the URL, the page gets instantly blocked by adguard, this already indicates a very inconvenient environment for testing because I need to share this URL with others but want to know how the page looks like. To help you better understand, this is the source of the URL at Cloudflare:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0015315c-a66c-48bf-b391-164ab5b9b734)

> That service is used in Japan for illegal purposes

I cannot really give you an answer of why R2 is often used for illegal purposes in Japan, but I think being as an ad filter, you should not block domains on behalf of the law enforcement, since I use the filter in the Canada for hosting my pictures.

> and domains are frequently changed (maybe CF blocks it sometimes).

Yes, the URL is unique to a bucket, I have created 6 buckets in my account, each of them has a different id in the URL. If someone wants to dodge the ban, they can recreate a bucket so the URL will change, but it also blocks legitimate users.

---

My real case is that I do not want to bind a [custom domain](https://developers.cloudflare.com/r2/buckets/public-buckets/#custom-domains) to the R2 bucket, so I need to use this URL for file sharing. It is just a legitimate use case. 

I appreciate the response from @elithrar, this is exactly what I am doing, and likely many others doing when they do not own any domain.

issue.title: b3mxnuvcer.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Trackers)
 [http://b3mxnuvcer.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fb3mxnuvcer.com)
### Comment
> Tracking. Found on https://www.revenuehero.io.
> 
> Repeated requests api.b3mxnuvcer.com/sdk/event/update_properties initiated by asset.b3mxnuvcer.com/b3mxnuvcer.js.
> 
> Payload is encoded. After decoding it using ChatGPT (it was mentioning Caesar cipher), the following phrases appear in payload:
> 
> User ID
> Event Name: revenuhero
> Event Properties
> Page Title: RevenuHero 1 Mrfound lead conversion * scheduling
> Reference Domain, URL, Page Value URL
> Page Load Time
> Platform, Screen Width, Screen Height
> Auto: true

issue.title: www.javatpoint.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175538) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.title: 2gis.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://2gis.ru/moscow](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F2gis.ru%2Fmoscow) ### Comment > Если работать с сайтом 2ГИС со смартфона через браузер а не через их мобильное приложение, то если AdGuard включен то невозможно начать пользоваться сайтом поскольку вся страница сайта является затемнённой и не реагирует на касания пользователя. Когда выключил AdGuard то оказалось что AdGuard блокирует один элемент который изначально накладывается на сайт поверх и требует обязательного выбора со стороны пользователя (нужно выбрать и нажать остаться на сайте или перейти в мобильное приложение) (данный элемент скорее всего отображается сайтом не зависимо от того установлено или нет их мобильное приложение, у меня оно не установлено)... Т.е. когда я временно отключил защиту в AdGuard и обновил страницу в браузере то этот элемент появился поверх страницы сайта и после того как я нажал в нём нужную кнопку чтобы остаться на сайте то он пропал но и страница сайта стала не затемнённой и сайтом стало можно пользоватся... Если повторно заходить на сайт не очищая данные браузера то потом уже проблема не повторяется и сайт работает нормально даже с включенным AdGuard, но после очистки данных браузера и при последующем заходе на сайт проблема повторяется снова... Воспроизведение по этому сценарию всегда стабильное... Москва взята только как пример и город по умолчанию на сайте наверное... А так эта проблема воспроизводится для карты любого города... Нужно бы наверное подправить что-то в каком-то из фильтров AdGuard... Заранее спасибо. С уважением. Username: `@NUser2018` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/f83um7qd8dckokg8kk4wgo0kg8ks404j5b6mv9yi8o.jpg?nc=1)
